channel.title: Posts on Renlord
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Renlord

item.description: What I care about applications I use? There’s been an abundance of applications implemented nowadays for all kinds of use-cases. In the following order of importance: - Privacy - Systems Performance - Fault Tolerance - Programmatic Usability - Anonymity Most software written nowadays do not focus on the above metrics. Instead they focus on GUI-friendliness and ease of use as the primary focus, which makes program composition difficult going-forward.
